nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: This is Earth Command. Your transmission shows a stabilized gate signature and... the Prometheus beacon. We'd written that ship off as a ghost story. Report, Captain.

choices.text: Give him the full, unredacted report.
[Reconnaissance] Maya, analyze Holt's speech for micro-expressions. Is he surprised?
[Bluff] "The situation is contained, Commander. Just a standard salvage operation."
[Previous Loop] "Commander, let's dispense with the formalities. You know as well as I do that the Prometheus was no ordinary loss."

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Transmitting the full mission log, sir. The 'Song of Unmaking', the Void, the Chorus... it's all in there.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Analysis: Commander Holt's tone indicates... feigned surprise. Vocal patterns suggest he was anticipating your report on the Prometheus. He knows more than he is letting on.

choices.text: Give him a partial report. Keep the key details back.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: Standard salvage? Captain, we're reading residual quantum entanglement around your ship. That's not 'standard'. Talk to me.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.body_language: Holt leans forward, his expression hardening. The official mask drops.
nodes.text: Secure channel engaged. What do you know? And how?

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: ...Good God. A sentient memetic virus... Get your crew and your ship to the orbital quarantine station. We're classifying this report Level 11. No one is to speak of this.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: Alright, Captain. You're right. The Prometheus was Section 31 business. A black project to study the gates. It went wrong. Now, what did you find, and who else knows about it?

choices.text: Form a secret alliance. Work outside official channels.
Threaten to expose him if he doesn't cooperate.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: Captain, I get the feeling you're holding back. I'll expect a full, unredacted accounting upon your return to Earth. Don't make this difficult.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: A risky play, Captain. But necessary. You have my unofficial support. I'll keep the top brass off your back, you keep feeding me intel. Welcome to the real war.

nodes.speaker: earth_commander_holt
nodes.text: You have guts, Captain. I'll give you that. Fine. You'll get your resources. But you've made a powerful enemy today.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have been hailed as a hero and taken into confidence, but you are now part of the cover-up.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You kept your secrets, but have drawn the suspicion of Earth Command.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have forged a secret alliance with a powerful figure in Earth Command, entering a world of shadows.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You blackmailed your way to getting what you need, but have made a dangerous enemy.
